G

Game - Class in com.eep.taxe.models
Represents a Game (match) between any two players.
Game(String, Game.Difficulty) - Constructor for class com.eep.taxe.models.Game
Creates a Game and fills it with some data.
Game.Difficulty - Enum in com.eep.taxe.models
This enumeration type is used to represent the levels of difficulty in the game.

getShortestPath(Vertex, Vertex) - Method in class com.eep.taxe.models.Game
